# Basic working

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(reticulate)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{python}
import pandas
cars = r.mtcars
```
```{r}
py$cars %>% 
  dplyr::filter(cyl >= 6) %>% 
  ggplot2::ggplot(aes(x = disp, y = qsec)) +
  geom_point()

```
